resources.string: SocioTraffic is developed as a group project under the CDAC-Noida institution in guidance of Ms. Rosy Verma.Joint efforts of Shreyash Singh, Uditi Jain, Jyoti Rai and Dinesh Kumar have made an attempt to ease traffic struck life of people in Delhi.Socio-Traffic works to create a hassle-free drive time for the users of app by empowering them with traffic updates in their area through socializing on the app via posts from other users.We at Socio traffic aim to exempt out users the troublesome traffic jam and help them into a smooth and on time ride.We understand the value of time but more valuable is life. Our users can actively help the ones in need by contacting nearest hospitals in their area by the contact details yhat we have provided.

Q.What should I do if I am stopped by traffic police?
 Ans: You can do either of the following things:
 1. Pay-up: Pay the compounding amount against a receipt or
 2. Contest: Surrender a document (like driving license) against a challan receipt and attend the court on a given date. In the court, after contesting the case, you will be either: i) acquitted or ii) fined.

Q. What documents should a driver carry when driving?
 Ans: A driver should carry following documents when driving:
 1. Driving License
 2. Registration certificate
 3. Taxation Certificate
 4. P.U.C Certificate
 5. Insurance Certificate.
 6. Fitness Certificate and permit.

Q.What are duties of a driver in case of an accident?
 Ans: The driver duties include:
 1. Arrange some medical help.
 2. Inform police.
Q. How Can I edit my profile?\n Ans: You could simply go to “Profile” in “Menu” panel and click on “Edit” to make changes and “Save” after done.
Q. What does reported in my post mean?\n Ans: If any content is offensive and another user of the app finds it in appropriate, they can report it.
Q. What Action will be taken if my post is reported?\n Ans: If your post has been reported 5 times the post will be automatically deleted from the timeline.
Q. Why is there a list of Hospitals in the app?\n Ans: In case you witness any accident, these listed hospitals are the nearest in your current area that you can contact for first aid.

Q. What can I do in case my vehicle has been towed?\n Ans: Contact the nearest Traffic Circle. You will be required to pay compounding amount for improper parking plus towing away charges depending upon your vehicle type.
